attributes.action: Force Supermarket to include Fruit Loss Leaders fo
attributes.additional_details: With supermarkets selling CD's, Books and alcohol at loss leading prices to the detriment of the high street (HMV) while making extortionate profits on fruit and veg.  The government should therefore enforce guidelines that for every 2 non-essentials or unhealthy loss leading products the supermarket must have a compensating loss leading product with the fruit and veg section.  This should at least help people to eat healthy and help cut obesity.  While give some high street shops protection from competing with ludicrous prices.
